General.Name: Galway Gold Inc
General.Description: Galway Gold Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral resource properties. It holds interests in the Reina de Oro property located in the Santander mining district of Colombia. Galway Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
